# <text:cyan>Debug Page
<text:lightGray>Simple textbox test

<hr:"=">

<text:white>Type something and click the button to display it:

<text:lightGray>Test input: <textbox width:"30" fg:yellow bg:gray blinkChar:"_" id:"testInput" text:"Type here">

<button label:"Read Value" fg:black bg:lime pressBg:green id:"printBtn" onClick:PrintValue>

<hr:"-">

<text:gray>Output: <id:"outputDisplay"><text:white>[Not read yet]

<hr:"=">

<script event:"PrintValue">
  local testElem = document.getElementById("testInput")

  if testElem then
    local value = testElem.text
    document.setElementBodyById("outputDisplay", "'" .. value .. "'")
  else
    document.setElementBodyById("outputDisplay", "ERROR: Could not find element")
  end
</script>
